topicTitle: I want your opinion on something you can all benefit from...

posts.postText:
Hey all refunds here with yes... Another post ;D 

Anyway what do you guys think of me getting us a ventrilo server. 
Only downside is that so far the only deal I can find is a 5 man server and I'm still unsure how long I will have it.

So before I go ahead with this I want your opinions and in gonna research a little more.
Sounds cool, but what would we use it for?

Agreed,
If you are going to buy a server, consider buying another GMOD Server. We could use it for build or something like that.

If you donate a server to [NNJG] you should become admin. :v
 But gmod, not ventrillo.
Yeah, a build would be cool.
After spring break I might buy a 12 slot garry's mod server to add to nnjg.
Have any of you ever considered a TF2 one?

Ok well I'm startingto think you guys dot know what ventrilo is. Anyway I don't know what I would use it for but I also said b4 that I can't purchase things through paypal since I don't have one so no server. As for getting a vent server it would be free and I know places that I can do that. 

Ventrilo is an online real time voice hat thing that is free ticdowbload and really helpful but know that I think about it is pretty unuseful.

Just voice chat, and I don't even use a mic.
I see no point for this, because we join to play games, not to talk to eachother. :l
Ok gash you make a good point. Go ahead and lock this.
